preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh 29.12 g of cesium carbonate (Cs). 
 2. Weigh 58.24 g of copper(II) oxide (CuO). 
 3. Weigh 31.00 g of phosphoric acid (H3PO4). 
 4. In a clean, dry container, mix Cs and CuO thoroughly using a mortar and pestle. 
 5. Slowly add phosphoric acid while continuously stirring to form a homogeneous paste.
